text: @charliekirk11 Stop being stupid, you racist bastard. There's nothing called the Chinese Coronavirus. I am one hundred percent sure Hillary Clinton would have done a far better job than this inept and morally bankrupt President. Trump quits on the American people. He failed miserably.
